ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 329
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve been checking the web sites and have yet to find what the catapults are.  I assume they are a weapon.  If so, what kind?  If not, please set me straight.
ygData.messageBody:
I've been checking the web sites and have yet to find what the catapults are. I
assume they are a weapon. If so, what kind? If not, please set me straight.

Also, is it true that tinkered cams cannot be used in bowyering?

Thanks,
Gwendlethop
Cazic-Thule


Aidanz2@... wrote:

> i've been away from the boards for a while so forgive me for asking, did you
> say CATAPAULTS! whats the recipe for these, and how much damage do they do?
> I;'ve been waiting for an excuse to waste alot of plat to raise my skill and
> this sounds like a pretty good 1 ;)
